name: MDLIndexBitDepth
desc: Options for the size of integer data in a submesh’s index buffer, used by the indexType property.

items.name: case invalid
items.desc: The submesh has not been initialized or its data type is unknown.

items.name: case uInt8
items.desc: Each index in the submesh’s index buffer is an 8-bit integer.

items.name: case uInt16
items.desc: Each index in the submesh’s index buffer is a 16-bit integer.

items.name: case uInt32
items.desc: Each index in the submesh’s index buffer is a 32-bit integer.
